entry.title: Put me in a movie
entry.summary:
Author: k3w4m

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,067Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 5

Summary: After Bruce ran from his forced part time job as a porn star his face got unblurred from all of videos he starred in as punishment for leaving, and everyone sees them including the batfamily, the justice league and basically everyone in Gotham.How is Bruce going to fix this?
